import React,{ useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { getOrderDetails } from "../../../redux/actions/orderActions" import {Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Row, Image, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' export const OrderDetails = () => { const url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/media/photo/" const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) //console.log(orderDetails) const {order} = orderDetails const products = order?.order_items console.log(products?.[0].image) const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(id)) // eslint-disable-next-line }, [dispatch] ) return (

Details de ma commande

Livraison

{order?.user.first_name} {order?.user.last_name}

{order?.user.address}

{order?.user.postcode}

{order?.user.city}

Montant Total

{order?.totalPrice} €

Articles



{products ? products.map((item) => ( {item.name} quantité(s) : {item.quantity} )) : (

aucune commande

)}
) }
